bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of wind intrusion into the five depots. Combined Designation of xin feng 心風 , heart wind; fei feng 肺風 , lung wind; pi feng 脾風 , spleen wind; gan feng 肝 風 , liver wind; and shen feng 腎風 , kidney wind . Su wen 素問 42: 風中五臟六腑之 俞，亦為臟腑之風 … 五臟風之形狀不同，願聞其診及其病能 , “[Qi Bo:] When the wind strikes the transporters of the five depots and six palaces, this, too, causes wind of the depots and palaces. [Huang Di:] In what way do the physical manifestations of wind [affecting] the five depots differ? I should like to hear about their diagnosis and about the manifestations of the [respective] diseases”.
